description:
Inspector Megure asks Kogoro for help disguising himself as a famous safecracker and infiltrating a gang of thieves. However, the gang boss Mr. Head sees through his disguise. The man who killed Head`s son is among his subordinates, and he instructs Kogoro to work with the gang as planned to determine the killer`s identity.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: あやつられた名探偵 (前編)
